title: Is there any list anywhere of what abilities can and can't be QSS'd/Mikael's'd/Cleansed?

replies.body:
knockups can't be removed period.
QSS removes all debuffs, including suppresses and zeds ult.
mikaels doesn't remove suppresses, blinds, or knockups.
cleanse will remove all disables, including summoner spells, except for suppresses and zeds ult.
that's basically all there is to it
All knockups and knockback. There is a list on lol wiki but I don't have the link.
